item.description:
You are invited to A Taste of the Wine Business at a private home in Hamden!

Take 45 minutes to Come and Savor A Taste of the Wine Business and get information about this Grape Opportunity! Participation is free and there is no obligation.

Learn how You can have your own business as a Traveling Vineyard Independent Wine Consultant! Whether you want to turn your passion for wine into money, free trips around the world, or just to learn more about the world of wine this is the meeting you do not want to miss!

Information will also be provided on how to have your own in home private wine tasting event!

There could not be a better time to start learning and earning as a Traveling Vineyard Wine Consultant! Join us in Boston this summer for Harvest and tour with us in Napa!

Group members who have RSVP'd will be provided with the meeting address and contact information. Please feel free to email me if you would like more information.
Cheers!

Lynn
Independent Wine Consultant
The Traveling Vineyard
http://myttv.com/lynn...


Click here for more info about tasting wine for a living:
http://www.vineyardwi...
